items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether you‚Äôre running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.

items.content_html: react-doc-render is a lightweight React library for rendering documents of various popular MIME types directly in the browser. It supports formats such as PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, GIF), text files, and Microsoft Office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), providing a simple and unified interface to handle different content types.
items.title: nikiforov-org/react-doc-render: react-doc-render is a lightweight React library for rendering documents of various popular MIME types directly in the browser. It supports formats such as PDF, images (JPEG, PNG, GIF), text files, and Microsoft Office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), providing a simple and unified interface to handle different content types.
